thread.title: Bristol LA Unveils Second Collection Inspired by NBA Fashion
thread.title_full: Bristol LA Unveils Second Collection Inspired by NBA Fashion

author: Marcus Cho
title: Bristol LA Unveils Second Collection Inspired by NBA Fashion

organizations.name: bristol la unveils second collection inspired
bristol showroom at paris fashion week

text:
Visit the original post to see all 21 images from this gallery. 
Los Angeles-based lifestyle label Bristol has made quite a splash on the industry since its founding in 2014, and with its newest collection, it looks like they’re looking to solidify their position in the industry.
Constructed solely from the finest of Japanese fabrics and Italian wool, Bristol’s second and newest collection was inspired by the dress of NBA legends in Kobe Bryant, Allen Iverson and Tracy McGrady. Through pushing creative boundaries and challenging “dress codes” and the norm, the result is a selection filled with conventional silhouettes, created in unconventional ways.
Key pieces to watch out for are the flight jacket, sherpa coat, and angular-cut corduroys, to name a few. Set to be split up into three deliveries between Spring/Summer 2017, Fall/Winter 2017 and the holiday season, be sure to be on the lookout for further news on specific drop dates.
In further celebration of the collection, Bristol will be hosting a special cocktail party at their showroom during Paris Fashion Week: Men’s on January 18 from 8 p.m. to midnight. 
Bristol Showroom at Paris Fashion Week 
40 Rue de la Tour d’Auvergne
75009, Paris
